info.title: SurveyMonkey
info.description: SurveyMonkey is the world's leading provider of web-based survey solutions. These solutions are used by companies, organizations, and individuals to gather the insights they need to make more informed decisions.

get.description: List the surveys in the account.
Get details of a specific collector.
Get survey messages for a given survey collector.
Get a list of collectors for a given survey.
Get details of a specific survey.

post.description: Send or schedule to send an existing message to all message recipients.

get.summary: When a new survey is created
get.description: Triggers a new flow when a survey is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a survey.

get.summary: When a new collector is created
get.description: Triggers a new flow when a collector is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a survey collector.

get.summary: When a new collector response is added
get.description: Triggers a new flow when a response is added (paid account only).
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, respond to a survey.

get.summary: When a new survey response is added
get.description: Triggers a new flow when a survey response is added (paid account only).
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, respond to a survey.

get.description: List the pages for a survey

get.summary: When a new survey response to a question is added
get.description: Triggers a new flow when a response to a question is added (paid account only).
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, respond to a survey question.

get.description: List the questions on a given survey page

redirect_url.description: Redirect to this url upon survey completion.

closed_page_message.description: Message shown when a survey is closed.

response_count.description: Number of responses survey has received.

page_count.description: Number of pages in the survey.

category.description: Survey category chosen when creating the survey.

analyze_url.description: The URL for the results of the survey.

summary_url.description: The URL for the summary of the survey.

date_created.description: The date the survey was created.

scheduled_date.description: Date message was scheduled to be sent.

body.description: The plain text body of the email message to be sent to recipients.

subject.description: Subject of the email message to be sent to recipients.
